thread.title: to all Berliners, Berlinonians and Berlinites...

post.author: Brain Trepaning
post.body: As it turns out, the bass player from my band is in Berlin for the next 10 days, both for business and to visit family. He was foolish enough to tell me he is staying at the Savoy in Berlin, so if any of you locals feel like ordering a bunch of plain cheese pizzas or something and having them sent to Anthony Bischoff at the Savoy, it would be much appreciated, thanks.
